title: For Sale: 1-Bedroom Unit at Bristol at Parkway Place by Filinvest,  Alabang, Muntinlupa City
ANUVA RESIDENCE resort landscape garden near SLEX NAIA Sm Sucat
description:
Welcome to ANUVA Residence, I have 7 various units, 5 bedroom and 2 bedrooms respectively,  fully furnished,  pool access(Brokers/ Agents  are welcome).

Can be rented daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly.

Top 10 Advantages of Staying in Anuva Residences, Sucat (For Rentpad Ad)
1. Prime Location Along SLEX
Strategically located along the East Service Road, just minutes from SLEX Sucat Exit—easy access to Makati, BGC, Alabang, and NAIA.
2. Affordable Urban Living
Competitive rental rates with resort-style features—ideal for young professionals, small families, and students.
3. Resort-Inspired Amenities
Enjoy swimming pools, clubhouse, jogging paths, basketball court, landscaped gardens, and kids' play area.
4. Ready for Move-In Units
Fully furnished and semi-furnished options available—just bring your suitcase and settle in.
5. Near Malls, Groceries & Schools
Close to SM City Sucat, Santana Grove, Alabang Town Center, and schools like PAREF Southridge and San Beda Alabang.
6. Flood-Free & Gated Community
Secure, elevated location with 24/7 security and perimeter fencing—peace of mind for all residents.
7. Efficient Transport Access
Near bus stops, jeepney routes, and future Skyway expansions—ideal for commuters.
8. Family-Friendly Environment
Quiet neighborhood with child-safe amenities and community spaces—perfect for starting families.
9. Green Open Spaces
Over 80% open space in the development—rare in Metro Manila condos, offering fresh air and less congestion.
10. Flexible Lease Terms
Short-term and long-term rentals available; flexible deals to suit different tenant needs.

title: Fully Furnished 1BR Condo for Sale in Parque España, Filinvest, Alabang
description:
JP-CP - D




Welcome to Parque España !




Located along East Asia Drive at Filinvest City is Parque España, a residence hotel in Muntinlupa City managed by Hospitality Innovators, Inc. Offering top- rate accommodation, Parque España redefines the home-away-from-home concept, allowing business and leisure travelers to relish the utmost in comfort and hospitality.




Parque España offers flexible hotel leasing options - all under negotiable terms. Tenants can choose from a range of fully furnished units with modern amenities: one bedroom deluxe, business executive, two bedroom premiere, and three bedroom suite. Each room features double beds, cable TV, broadband internet, IDD/NDD phone, and hot and cold shower.




Apart from the aforementioned comforts, Parque España provides first class services that include housekeeping, laundry and dry cleaning, airport transfer, car rental, in-room massage, complimentary 24-hour shuttle service to neighboring malls, safety deposit boxes, and a business center. Moreover, for leisure and relaxation, the residence hotel also has an outdoor swimming pool, restaurant, lobby lounge, function room, and a fitness center.

title: Corner 2BR Unit for Sale in Bristol at Parkway, Filinvest Alabang, Muntinlupa
description:
ND-CP
 

 Corner 2BR Unit for Sale in Bristol at Parkway, Filinvest Alabang, Muntinlupa
 

 *** For BUYERS Only ***
 

 Welcome to Bristol at Parkway !
 

 

 Standing 40 storeys high, the Bristol Tower illuminates the majestic Filinvest City skyline. The upscale residential condominium in Muntinlupa City is the second of four towers at Parkway Place, a mixed-use development by Filinvest Premier.
 Offering a total of 345 masterfully designed luxury residential spaces, Bristol Tower offers one, two and three bedroom units, each boasting of efficient layouts, high-grade finishes, and quality craftsmanship. Apart from these, the Bristol Tower also provides an exhilarating view of Laguna de Bay, affording a privileged few a distinctive living experience.
 A notable landmark, the Bristol Tower introduces Zen-inspired amenities such as swimming pools, a landscaped pool deck, courtyard, function room, fitness center, children’s play area, meditation area, study hall, and a media center.
 Straddling the Corporate and Parkway Avenues, Bristol Tower is just a block away from the exclusive Palms Country Club, and is just minutes from the PAREF Woodrose School, De La Salle-Zobel School, PAREF Southridge School, and the Asian Hospital.

title: ALABANG CBD Office Unit for sale 175 sqm READY FOR OPERATION!
description:
175-sqm Completely Fitted-out Fully-Furnished Office Unit in Alabang For Sale 

MOVE-IN READY. READY FOR IMMEDIATE BUSINESS OPERATION.




Location:  Parkway Corporate Center

                   Filinvest City, Alabang, Muntinlupa




Parkway Corporate Center – a modern premium Grade A office building that is LEED-certified.

Conveniently located at the main gateway of Filinvest City, Alabang, Muntinlupa City – south Metro Manila’s premier business district and garden city. Accessible and convenient to private, as well as public transportation.




Proximity to retail/leisure: Festival Mall, Alabang Town Center Ayala Mall; hotels Crimson, Acacia, Somerset, Bellevue; and world-class health facility Asian Hospital.




Fully furnished with office furniture, air-conditioning system, local area network.

Includes:

6 office rooms with chairs, tables and drawers.

Workstations for 12 persons with chairs, tables and drawers.

Working table that can fit 8 more persons

Conference/meeting room with chairs and tables

Pantry area with refrigerator

Reception area

Filing cabinets

*Has space to accommodate up to 10 more workstations.

With installed air-conditioning system

With installed local area network cabling

With installed biometric security access

With installed CCTV camera

Building Amenities:

Elegant main lobby reception area

Retail plaza at ground floor

Business center at 7th level

Podium deck garden

100% back-up power

24-hours security station

Fiber optic backbone

Automatic fire alarm and sprinkler system

6 high-speed elevators




Asking Price:

Php 46,500,000.00

Includes 3 parking slots




Selling below fair market value.

title: FOR SALE | 1 BEDROOM CONDO UNIT IN AVIDA TOWERS ALTURA, MUNTINLUPA CITY
For Sale 2 Bedroom Viento at Cerca Ayala Alabang
description:
2 Bedroom Condominium for Sale

Cerca Viento, Cerca Ayala Alabang




Unfurnished

2 Bedroom

69sqm




Php 10M







Viento is a three-tower residential development and Alveo Land’s first installment of the Cerca masterplan. Walkways and paths connect residents to a selection of distinct restaurants, cafes, and service establishments, making vibrant gatherings and everyday conveniences closer to home. Easy city living starts in any of the studio, one-, two-, three-, and four-bedroom units ranging from approximately 24 to 195 sq.m.

As Alveo Land’s first foray into Alabang, Cerca, is a 6.6-hectare mixed-use district emanating the laid-back lifestyle that is distinct to the South. It is a walkable and highly-accessible masterplan where verdant spaces and urban elements are in perfect balance, and an array of retail and dining options encircle the district’s signature rotunda. In the South, residents can enjoy a more intimate atmosphere with an expanse of opportunities to live well.

Cerca is accessible through Investment Drive, Alabang–Zapote Road, and Daang Hari Road. Nearby are long standing leisure and retail destinations such as Alabang Town Center, Westgate Center, and Molito Lifestyle Center. For a laid-back weekend, South residents can also enjoy an afternoon in Alabang Country Club, Palms Country Club, and Southlinks Golf Club.

Avida Towers Ardane is the second residential condominium in Muntinlupa, Alabang

Located in South Park District along National Highway it is HIGHLY accessible for both for car owners and commuters alike!!

Car owners can take Skyway, South Luzon Expressway or National Highway to get to the property, and for commuters there is a transport terminal in Ayala Malls South Park there is also a provincial bus station within the vincinity and jeepney’s passby national highway

Renters who work in the many offices in Alabang and along National Road will be your main market as well as the parents of students who study in the many schools and colleges along the area - even Lyceum of Alabang is ONE JEEPNEY AWAY!

For End Users - living in Avida Towers Ardane will surely be enjoyable - with the panoramic view of the mountainous south, the exciting city lights of the north, or simply enjoying the view of alabang and south park district and its amenities it will bring an enjoyable experience. Convenience is key to a hassle free lifestyle! - retail stores are present along the area and to top it off Ayala Malls South Park is just a few step away!

1 Bedroom Junior Condo Unit for sale in Alabang | Avida Towers Ardane
description:
Avida Towers Ardane – Modern Living in South Park District, Alabang

Overview

Avida Towers Ardane is a premier residential condominium development by Avida Land (an Ayala Land Company) located in the bustling South Park District, Alabang, Muntinlupa City. This master-planned community offers a perfect blend of convenience, comfort, and urban sophistication. Designed for professionals, families, and investors, Avida Towers Ardane combines contemporary design, practical living spaces, and resort-like amenities within a thriving lifestyle district.

Key Features and Highlights

Location:
	•	Address: South Park District, National Road, Alabang, Muntinlupa City.
	•	Proximity: Located at the heart of South Metro Manila, Avida Towers Ardane connects you to essential destinations:
	•	Business hubs: Filinvest City, Madrigal Business Park, and Northgate Cyberzone.
	•	Shopping centers: Alabang Town Center, Festival Mall, and SM Southmall.
	•	Major roads: Accessible via South Luzon Expressway (SLEX), Skyway, and Alabang-Zapote Road.
	•	Transport: Close to PNR Alabang Station and various bus routes.

Development Details:
	•	Developer: Avida Land Corporation
	•	Total Towers: 2 high-rise residential towers
	•	Unit Offerings:
	•	Studio Unit: 23.30 sqm
	•	Junior One-Bedroom: 23.30 sqm
	•	One-Bedroom with Balcony Unit: 38.2 sqm
	•	Completion Dates: Tower 1 (July 2025)

Amenities:
Avida Towers Ardane is designed to offer an active, dynamic lifestyle with its wide array of recreational amenities:
	•	Adult and kiddie swimming pools
	•	Outdoor gym and fitness area
	•	Children’s play zone
	•	Landscaped gardens and open spaces
	•	Clubhouse and function rooms for gatherings
	•	Jogging paths and fitness trails
	•	Retail shops and services at the ground level
	•	24/7 security and concierge services
	4.	Green and Sustainable Features:
	•	Well-ventilated common areas
	•	Natural lighting to reduce energy consumption
	•	Water-saving fixtures
	•	Integrated waste management system

Why Choose Avida Towers Ardane?
	•	Integrated Living in South Park District:
Enjoy a balanced lifestyle with access to retail, dining, and leisure options, all within walking distance in Ayala Land’s South Park District.
	•	Accessibility:
Strategically located near key transport routes, making daily commutes to Makati, BGC, and other Metro Manila areas convenient.
	•	Resort-Style Amenities:
Unwind and recharge with amenities designed for relaxation, fitness, and recreation.
	•	Ayala Land Brand Assurance:
Backed by Avida Land’s legacy of quality and reliability, ensuring long-term value for your investment.
	•	Ideal for End-Users and Investors:
The prime location and vibrant community make Avida Towers Ardane a desirable address for homeowners and a lucrative option for rental property investors.

Pricing and Payment Terms
	•	Price Range:
	•	Junior 1 Bedroom: 
                           TCP: ₱ 5, 187, 000
                           10% SPOT DP: ₱ 451, 360.03
                           10% STRETCHED IN 54mos: ₱ 8, 914.08
                           80% BANK FINANCING: ₱ 3, 850, 880.21
(Prices vary based on unit size, floor level, and availability.)

	•	Flexible Payment Options:
                    -Spot Cash
	            -Deferred Payment Terms
                    -Bank Financing Available

Nearby Establishments:
	•	Schools: De La Salle Zobel | San Beda Alabang | FEU
	•	Hospitals: Asian Hospital | Alabang Medical Clinic
	•	Recreational Destinations: Alabang Country Club | The Palms Country Club

Secure your future home in South Park District! Discover modern and convenient living at Avida Towers Ardane today And for unit reservations for only ₱50,000.

Walkways and paths connect different areas, fostering a friendly and open atmosphere. Located in the 6.6-hectare Cerca mixed-use district near Ayala Alabang, Viento is easily accessible from Investment Drive, Alabang-Zapote Road, and Daang Hari Road. The area is surrounded by green spaces and offers plenty of walkable areas, providing a relaxed and convenient living environment in the South.

title: Condo for Sale at Alabang Muntinlupa near Ayala Alabang
description:
Condo for Sale at Alabang Muntinlupa near Ayala Alabang




Name of Project: Cerca featuring Viento Condominiums

Location: Investment Drive, Ayala Alabang, Muntinlupa City

Developer: Alveo by Ayala Land Corp.




As Alveo Land’s first foray into Alabang, Cerca, is a 6.6-hectare mixed-use district emanating the laid-back lifestyle that is distinct to the South. It is a walkable and highly-accessible masterplan where verdant spaces and urban elements are in perfect balance, and an array of retail and dining options encircle the district’s signature rotunda.




Viento is a three-tower residential development and Alveo Land’s first installment of the Cerca masterplan. Walkways and paths connect residents to a selection of distinct restaurants, cafes, and service establishments, making vibrant gatherings and everyday conveniences closer to home. Easy city living starts in any of the studio, one-, two-, three-, and four-bedroom units ranging from approximately 24 to 195 sqm.




Cerca is accessible through Investment Drive, Alabang–Zapote Road, and Daang Hari Road. Nearby are long standing leisure and retail destinations such as Alabang Town Center, Westgate Center, and Molito Lifestyle Center. For a laid-back weekend, South residents can also enjoy an afternoon in Alabang Country Club, Palms Country Club, and Southlinks Golf Club.

title: 1 Bedroom Condo Unit for sale in Sucat, Muntinlupa City
description:
1 BR Ready for Occupancy in Sucat Muntinlupa

Tribeca Residences is a resort-inspired residential condominium. It is located in Sucat, Muntinlupa City, Tribeca offers a unique blend of urban convenience and resort-style living. 

Tribeca is strategically located along East Service Road in Muntinlupa City, providing easy access to major thoroughfares like the SLEX. Its proximity to the Makati and Alabang Central Business District makes it an ideal choice for professionals and families seeking a convenient commute.

It is within close range of various schools, hospitals, shopping malls, and airports, making it well-connected and convenient location.

Indoor and outdoor Amenities:
Swimming pool & Kiddie pool
Pool deck & Gazebo
Jogging trail & Open lawn
Barbecue pits & Playground
Basketball court & Clubhouse
Function room & Gym
Children's area & CCTV

Lobby & Fire alarm

title: Nuveo at Cerca - Refreshed City Living in Las Piñas
description:
Nuveo is Alveo Land’s newest residential offering within the 6.6-hectare Cerca district, located near Ayala Alabang. Designed to combine urban living with the laid-back charm of the South, Nuveo at Cerca provides residents with a vibrant and convenient lifestyle. Its prime location and thoughtfully designed amenities make it an ideal home for young professionals, growing families, and those who enjoy modern condo living with a touch of nature.

𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
● 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗟𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Situated along Investment Drive in Las Piñas City, Nuveo is easily accessible via Alabang-Zapote Road and Daang Hari Road, connecting residents to major cities like Makati and Bonifacio Global City. The development is also close to retail, dining, and leisure options, as well as healthcare and educational institutions​.
●𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗻 𝗔𝗺𝗲𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀: Nuveo offers a wide array of amenities designed to cater to all aspects of urban living, including:
● 𝗔 𝗹𝗮𝗽 𝗽𝗼𝗼𝗹, 𝗸𝗶𝗱𝗱𝗶𝗲 𝗽𝗼𝗼𝗹, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗼𝗼𝗹 𝗹𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗴𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗮𝘅𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻
● 𝗭𝗲𝗻 𝗴𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘀, 𝗮 𝗺𝗲𝗱𝗶𝘁𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗴𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗻, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮 𝗸𝗼𝗶 𝗽𝗼𝗻𝗱 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗰𝗲𝗳𝘂𝗹 𝗿𝗲𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘀 𝗚𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗹𝗮𝘄𝗻, 𝗸𝗶𝗱𝘀’ 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘆 𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗮, 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗲𝘁 𝘇𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗳𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗹𝘆 𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀
● 𝗜𝗻𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗼𝘂𝘁𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝗴𝘆𝗺𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗳𝗶𝘁𝗻𝗲𝘀𝘀 𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗵𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗮𝘀𝘁𝘀​.
● 𝗨𝗻𝗶𝘁 𝗧𝘆𝗽𝗲𝘀: Nuveo offers studio, one-bedroom, two-bedroom, and three-bedroom units, with sizes ranging from 29 to 199 sqm. Each unit is thoughtfully designed with modern finishes and optimized space, perfect for comfortable city living​.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗖𝗵𝗼𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗡𝘂𝘃𝗲𝗼 𝗮𝘁 𝗖𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗮?
Nuveo at Cerca provides the perfect balance between urban convenience and southern charm. Its strategic location and resort-like amenities make it an excellent choice for those seeking a dynamic yet relaxing lifestyle in Metro Manila’s South.

𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝗡𝘂𝘃𝗲𝗼 𝗮𝘁 𝗖𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗮?

title: Avida Towers Altura - Modern and Dynamic Living in Alabangs South Park District
description:
Avida Towers Altura is a residential condominium development by Avida Land, located within the South Park District in Alabang, Muntinlupa City. This high-rise community offers a dynamic urban lifestyle combined with the ease and comfort of suburban living. Designed for young professionals, families, and individuals seeking a balanced environment, Avida Towers Altura is part of a larger mixed-use estate that integrates residential, retail, and business spaces.

𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
● 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗟𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Avida Towers Altura is strategically situated in the South Park District, a 6.6-hectare mixed-use development along the National Road in Alabang. It provides easy access to major thoroughfares such as the South Luzon Expressway (SLEX) and Skyway, making it convenient to reach key areas like Makati, Bonifacio Global City, and Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA). It's also near commercial centers, schools, hospitals, and leisure spots, ensuring that everything you need is within reach.
● 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲𝗿𝗻 𝗔𝗺𝗲𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀: The development features a variety of amenities designed to enhance the living experience of its residents, including:
● 𝗦𝘄𝗶𝗺𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗣𝗼𝗼𝗹𝘀: Adult and kiddie pools for relaxation and recreation.
● 𝗖𝗵𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗿𝗲𝗻’𝘀 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘆 𝗔𝗿𝗲𝗮: Providing a fun and safe space for kids.
● 𝗖𝗹𝘂𝗯𝗵𝗼𝘂𝘀𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗙𝘂𝗻𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗥𝗼𝗼𝗺𝘀: Suitable for social gatherings and community events.
● 𝗢𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗟𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗴𝗲𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗚𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘀: Creating a refreshing atmosphere within the complex.
● 𝗜𝗻𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝗚𝘆𝗺: Equipped for those who prioritize an active lifestyle.
● 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗿𝘆 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗦𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗲𝘀: Avida Towers Altura offers various unit types, including studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom units. Each unit is designed with functional layouts and modern finishes to maximize space and comfort. The units feature large windows and balconies in selected configurations, providing natural light and views of the surrounding cityscape or landscaped areas.
● 𝗦𝗲𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗻𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴: The development ensures a secure environment with 24/7 security, CCTV surveillance, and a dedicated property management team. It also provides ample parking spaces and has retail options within the South Park District, offering added convenience for residents.

𝗪𝗵𝘆 𝗖𝗵𝗼𝗼𝘀𝗲 𝗔𝘃𝗶𝗱𝗮 𝗧𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗔𝗹𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗮?
Avida Towers Altura is ideal for those seeking a vibrant and convenient lifestyle in Alabang. Its strategic location within the South Park District, range of modern amenities, and contemporary living spaces make it an excellent choice for young professionals, families, and individuals who want to enjoy the best of urban living with a suburban touch.

𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝗔𝘃𝗶𝗱𝗮 𝗧𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗔𝗹𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗮?
If you're looking for a modern, convenient, and dynamic living space in Alabang, Avida Towers Altura is the perfect choice. Contact me today to learn more about the available units and how you can make this vibrant urban community your home.

title: 1 BEDROOM WITH PARKING FOR SALE IN LARSEN TOWER AT EAST BAY RESIDENCES BY ROCKWELL
Three-bedroom Condo for Sale in East Bay Residences, Sucat, Muntinlupa
description:
Developed by noted real estate firm Rockwell Land (through its subsidiary Rockwell Primaries), East Bay Residences promises the distinctive and luxurious living spaces the Rockwell brand is known for. Located strategically along East Service Road in Sucat, Muntinlupa, this multi-tower and verdant development is mere minutes away from some of Metro Manila's most notable business districts via the South Luzon Expressway and the Metro Manila Skyway, including Filinvest City Alabang (approximately 5 kilometers), Arca South (9 kilometers), Bonifacio Global City (16 kilometers), and the Makati Central Business District (14 kilometers). In addition, it is located 11.4 kilometers from Terminal 3 of the Ninoy Aquino International Airport (NAIA). East Bay Residences boasts a fine selection of exclusive amenities, including lap and kiddie pools, jogging path, a lawn, clubhouse, a function room, and a well-appointed fitness gym.
 

 This unfurnished unit for sale is located in East Bay Residences' Larsen Tower. It measures 107 square meters and has three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two balconies, a maid's room, and two parking slots.

FULLY FURNISHED 1 Bedroom w/ Parking Condo Unit for Sale in VIVANT FLATS Alabang : OK for Financing
Nuveo Tower 1- unit 215
description:
Refreshed City Living

The charm of the South meets the convenience of urban condo living at Cerca, Alveo’s sprawling 6.6-hectare mixed- use district right by Ayala Alabang. Cerca brings together retail, entertainment and living experiences that are a fresh and familiar take on Southern living. Nuveo at Cerca opens you up to a wealth of opportunities, right outside your doorstep.      




LOCATION

Address: Investment Drive, Barangay Almanza-Dos, Las Pinas City




At Cerca, access to the city’s essential destinations are close at hand—from major cities, to main road networks, leading institutions, retail spaces, offices, leisure settings, and healthcare facilities—bringing possibilities closer.




AMENITIES

Take time off without stressing about the details. Nuveo at Cerca is designed to seamlesslessy integrate activities to recharge its residents. At the ground level of your home, is an exclusive recreational cove, excellently landscaped to provide quiet corners for meditation, paths for jogging, tiered pools for swimming, and open manicured lawns for lounging or play. If retail therapy is what brings you joy, access to a private entrance of a curated retail space can be found on the same floor.

Condos for Sale in Alabang 2 Bed Room 85 SQM with Balcony Pre Selling
description:
We are excited to present to you an exceptional investment opportunity in the thriving heart of the South—Cerca. Nestled within the close-knit community of Alabang and Las Pinas City, Cerca epitomizes the perfect fusion of laidback Southern charm and urban sophistication. 

Alabang's dense yet close-knit population, combined with its diverse lifestyle offerings, makes it an ideal location for families and individuals seeking a vibrant and convenient living environment.

Introducing Nuveo at Cerca, the latest addition to Alveo's district in Ayala Alabang, where luxurious low-density living meets expansive green spaces. 

Nuveo is a three-tower residential complex that serves as a vibrant, refreshing Southern oasis amid the frenetic pace of a dynamic city. 

This prime enclave introduces a beautiful blend of Southern allure and contemporary condo living, enabling future residents to relish the best of both worlds—the vibrant and cozy atmosphere reminiscent of Southern living, and the modern creature comforts that come with condo living in the city.

Nuveo at Cerca provides a variety of unit options, from 

Studio units (30 sqm)  
Junior One-bedroom (52 sqm), 
One-bedroom (61 sqm), Two-bedroom (85 sqm), and 
Three-bedroom units (119 sqm). 

Each unit is thoughtfully designed with ample natural light, expansive views, and a sense of openness to create a comfortable and inviting living environment.

We invite you to explore our available units at Nuveo at Cerca. 

For viewing, presentation, or appointment, please get in touch with the details below:

Edwin Sayam
PRC Reg No: 23105
DHSUD Reg No. NCR- A - 24568

title: Elegant 2 Bedroom Condo Unit Deluxe for Sale in Botanika Natures Residences
Special Condo Unit 4 Bed Room Bi Level Near Alabang Town Center
description:
Cerca, rising in close proximity to the prestigious Ayala Alabang Village, offers unparalleled accessibility to essential destinations such as commercial establishments, shopping districts, learning institutions, and medical facilities—all within a radius of 1 to 2 kilometers. It's strategic location along major thoroughfares ensures effortless connectivity to key areas in Metro Manila and South Luzon.

Residents will have a variety of shopping and dining options within a 5 to 10-minute walk or drive from popular 

Destinations like Alabang Town Center, Molito Lifestyle Center, and Festival Mall. Cerca itself will feature a vibrant Retail 

Area designed to meet the diverse needs and preferences of its residents. This retail space spans 4,500 sqm and includes green areas, walkways, and essential amenities, fostering a neighborly atmosphere that complements the laidback charm of the south.

At the heart of Cerca lies Viento at Cerca, the first phase of the four-phase Cerca development. It's a three-tower residential development, with the first tower ready for occupancy, followed by the second tower scheduled for completion this year, and the third tower planned for 2026. With 272 units spanning approximately 25 to 177 square meters, Viento promises a seamlessly integrated living experience. Residents will enjoy a vibrant community atmosphere, with future residential towers enhancing the neighborly vibe.

Inspired by the Southern allure and contemporary condo living, Viento promises future residents a refreshing oasis amidst the dynamic city. Investors and homebuyers have the opportunity to be part of this modern Southern enclave.

We invite you to explore our available units at Viento at Cerca. 

For viewing, presentation, or appointment, please get in touch with the details below:

Edwin Sayam
PRC Reg No: 23105
DHSUD Reg No. NCR- A - 24568

description:
Cerca, rising in close proximity to the prestigious Ayala Alabang Village, offers unparalleled accessibility to essential destinations such as commercial establishments, shopping districts, learning institutions, and medical facilities—all within a radius of 1 to 2 kilometers. It's strategic location along major thoroughfares ensures effortless connectivity to key areas in Metro Manila and South Luzon.

Residents will have a variety of shopping and dining options within a 5 to 10-minute walk or drive from popular 

Destinations like Alabang Town Center, Molito Lifestyle Center, and Festival Mall. Cerca itself will feature a vibrant Retail 

Area designed to meet the diverse needs and preferences of its residents. This retail space spans 4,500 sqm and includes green areas, walkways, and essential amenities, fostering a neighborly atmosphere that complements the laidback charm of the south.

At the heart of Cerca lies Viento at Cerca, the first phase of the four-phase Cerca development. It's a three-tower residential development, with the first tower ready for occupancy, followed by the second tower scheduled for completion this year, and the third tower planned for 2026. With 272 units spanning approximately 25 to 177 square meters, Viento promises a seamlessly integrated living experience. Residents will enjoy a vibrant community atmosphere, with future residential towers enhancing the neighborly vibe.

Inspired by the Southern allure and contemporary condo living, Viento promises future residents a refreshing oasis amidst the dynamic city. Investors and homebuyers have the opportunity to be part of this modern Southern enclave.

We invite you to explore our available units at Viento at Cerca. 

For viewing, presentation, or appointment, please get in touch with the details below:

Edwin Sayam
PRC Reg No: 23105
DHSUD Reg No. NCR- A - 24568
publish_by: Ayala Land Property Investments Condos Lots and House & Lots

description:
About Viento at Cerca
Breathing life into a dynamic new district—Viento, the first phase of Cerca’s masterplan, rises with three residential towers cascading a living experience that is seamlessly integrated. Walkways and paths connect distinct lifestyles to a wide spectrum of choices, facilitating a neighborly atmosphere that’s bright and airy.

Ready for Occupancy 2 Bedroom Unit at Avida Towers Altura

Avida Towers Altura is a high-rise condominium development located in South Park District, Alabang, Muntinlupa City.
• It is part of the Ayala Land's master-planned community that offers residential and commercial spaces, providing convenience and accessibility to its residents. 
• It aims to provide a balanced lifestyle for its residents, combining urban convenience with natural elements.
• Offers convenient access to various shopping centers, restaurants, schools, hospitals, and transportation hubs. 
• It is strategically situated near major thoroughfares, making commuting to other parts of Metro Manila relatively convenient.

title: Rockwell East Bay Residences Condo for Sale in Sucat Muntinlupa
description:
East Bay Residences Condo for Sale

4th Floor Tower 3
1BR
38 sqm
Price:  3,320,000.00

Viewing is by Appointment only!


Rockwell Primaries has created a vibrant but distinctly laid-back neighborhood at East Bay Residences. Enjoy wide open spaces and lush landscapes in a peaceful atmosphere without venturing far from the heart of Metro Manila.

Located in KM21 East Service Road, Sucat, Muntinlupa City, East Bay Residences is within minutes from various retail hubs and service centers.

In it is the newly-launched The Larsen Tower, which is set to stand 20-stories high following The Fordham Tower, Rockwell Primaries’ first residential building in the property. Residents can also enjoy exclusive amenities and a carefully curated Retail Row catering to their every want and need.

Enjoy comfort, convenience, and exclusivity every day at a price within your reach.

Description: The Levels is a one-block, four-tower residential condominium development that offers laidback suburban living within the bustling business district of Filinvest City. Its unique architectural design features terracing levels, giving it a castle-like appearance. Residents can enjoy lush greenery and scenic views of the gardens from the high-rise sections. The project advocates nature appreciation and a different kind of suburban lifestyle.

Location: The Levels is conveniently situated within the 244-hectare Filinvest City, which combines a premiere CBD, garden city, mod metropolis, and convergence hub. It is easily accessible via the South Luzon Expressway, Alabang-Zapote Road, Commerce and Filinvest Avenues, and other internal roads within Filinvest City.

title: Best Deal New Listing 1 Bedroom at Solano Hills, Muntinlupa City For Sale
description:
Solano Hills Condominium
 Villongco road, Southbay, Muntinlupa
 
 Fully-furnished 1 bedroom Ground floor unit, 30 sq.m. plus 2 sq.m. small patio at the back door
 
 Ready for occupancy.
 Title is ready and available.
 
 Inclusive:
 Double-deck bed
 4-seater dining
 Sofa bed
 Big cabinet(room)
 Kitchen cabinet
 2 units of window type AC(1 at the room, 1 at living area)
 Refrigerator
 Water heater(shower)
 Electric fan
 Bathroom small cabinet
 
 About Solano Hills
 Solano Hills by PHINMA Properties is a 2.9-hectare property offering low-density condominiums in Sucat, Muntinlupa. The log-house inspired buildings along with the lush trees and greenery that line the streets make the community a hidden sanctuary in the busy city of Muntinlupa.
 
 Solano Hills in Sucat is conveniently placed in the middle of two business districts, and shopping centers and hospitals sit very close by. Solano Hills gives a refreshing take on city living by bringing the calming vibes of the countryside to Muntinlupa.
 
 Why Solano Hills is a perfect choice for you
 

 A unit for sale in Solano Hills is the perfect choice for those seeking solace and green spaces in the middle of a bustling city. PHINMA Properties assures affordability, convenience, and quality in their projects and Solano Hills is no different. A home in this peaceful community immediately takes your mind away from the rest of the city outside. The log house designs apparent in each building, along with its landscaped streets, give residents a piece of nature as they walk along the community.
 
 Solano Hills in Muntinlupa gives future residents the advantage of being close to work, places of leisure, and educational institutions without having to give up on excellent amenities and good location. Its affordable prices welcome a broad market of Filipino workers. With Solano Hills, a secure and peaceful home in the city is just within reach.
 
 Solano Hills Features and Amenities
 
 The development has swimming pools for adults and kids, a fully-equipped recreation room, along with a function hall for different occasions. Solano Hills also has a commercial area where dwellers can Â spend their free time and enjoy a variety of shopping and dining options.
 
 For tenant safety, 24-hour security and CCTV surveillance are present within the property, alongside fire exits, fire alarms, and smoke detectors.
 

 Highlights of the Development
 
 Solano Hills by PHINMA Properties is a smart choice for individuals and families looking for a home within a city, being a low density condominium that offers people much needed space and serenity while giving them the opportunity to explore what the rest of the community has to offer. The units are also ready for occupancy so future residents can move into their homes right away.
 

 Other Solano Hills Features
 

 Residents can take full advantage of the balconies present in other units, allowing for natural ventilation as well as giving a place to spend quiet times there or take in the view of the community. Solano Hills in Sucat, Muntinlupa is conveniently placed in the middle of three prominent business districts: Bonifacio Global City (23 mins) and Makati Central Business District (19 mins) up north and Madrigal Business Park (16 mins) down south. Solano Hills extends a warm welcome for working families and individuals that want the convenience of shorter and easier commute routes.
 
 Shopping centers and leisure spots like Santana Grove, SM Hypermarket, Festival Mall and Alabang Town Center are only seven to 19 minutes away, giving residents an array of Â shopping, dining, and entertainment options.
 

 Schools near the area include PAREF Southridge School (2.4km) and Muntinlupa Business High School (3.1km), while nearby hospitals such as Sucat Health Center and Medical Center Parañaque all sit within a three-kilometer distance.

Botanika Nature Residences is located in the most exclusive and quite portion of Filinvest City, Alabang beside the exclusive Palms Country Club and across Palms Pointe Village.

Botanika Nature Residences is a three tower premium, low-density residential enclave that offers the benefits of condominium living effortlessly integrated with the relaxed suburban lifestyle. More than being a lush vertical village. It is designed for genuine green living being a BERDE certified project.

Amenities:
🏊‍♀️ Dive into relaxation with the sparkling swimming pool, perfect for unwinding after a long day or soaking up the sun on weekends.
🏋️‍♂️ Stay fit and active at the fully-equipped fitness center, where you can engage in invigorating workouts and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
🍽️ Socialize and entertain friends at the function rooms, providing a stylish and comfortable space for gatherings and celebrations.
🌳 Take a leisurely stroll or enjoy a peaceful moment in the well-maintained landscaped gardens, providing a serene oasis within the bustling city.
🅿️ Conveniently park your vehicle in the secure and spacious parking area, ensuring peace of mind.

Location:
🌆 Studio One Alabang is strategically located in the heart of Alabang, surrounded by an array of dining options, shopping centers, schools, and entertainment hubs. Enjoy easy access to the vibrant Alabang Town Center, Festival Mall, and Molito Lifestyle Center.
🚆 Transportation is a breeze with proximity to major road networks, enabling convenient travel to neighboring cities and metro Manila.
💼 The condo is also ideal for young professionals, as it is in proximity to major business districts, ensuring a shorter commute.

Don't miss this chance to own your own slice of urban living at Studio One Alabang! Contact us today for more details and to schedule a viewing. 📞🏢✨ #StudioOneAlabang #ResaleCondo #UrbanLiving

Exclusive 3 Bedroom Unit For Sale in Botanika Nature Residences, Muntinlupa
description:
Looking for that tranquil yet homey condominium located at the South of Manila? Would you like to experience living amidst this lush green paradise within the upscale Filinvest City of Alabang? Then, you would truly love what we have for you!




Here at Botanika Nature Residences, every square inch is exceptionally designed with only the privileged few in mind.




Each piece puts into consideration highly refined tastes, executed in a well-balanced, careful process, to complement that fine level of sophistication & satisfaction.




Botanika understands that requirements do not come in one-size-fits-all conditions.




Thus, with several options that are readily available, two kinds of special units - garden units and penthouse units - are also thought of, simply perfect for your grand pursuits.




Enjoy the perks of being in a highly accessible modern metropolis, where all things essential are within reach, such as:




* De La Salle Zobel

* Paref Southridge School

* Paref Woodrose School

* San Beda College Alabang

* Westgate Center

* Festival Mall Alabang

* Crimson Hotel

* Asian Hospital




If you are a family looking for that exclusive,  mesmerizing enclave to live in, or an investor looking for a premium property that's worth every penny, then, you're reading this for a reason. This would be your very own Southern private retreat.




Send us a message now for your exclusive viewing appointment & site tour!




Here at Bella Realty PH, owning your dream home is just 1 click away..




Brought to you by:




BELLA REALTY PH

"Beautiful Properties for a Beautiful Life."

 AMENITIES
 
 Enjoy the refreshing feeling only nature can provide. Take a relaxing stroll amongst the greenery. Take a soothing dip in the pool. Relax at the outdoor lounge areas. Everything comes together to give you and your family comfort like no other.
 
 Be one with nature
 Located in Susana Heights, Muntinlupa, Leaf Residences creates the perfect atmosphere to let nature nurture your family. When you need to return, the commercial development built into the property ensures you never need to go far.

 Leaf Residences

An upscale high-rise residential condominium complex that offers green urban living in the heart of the garden CBD, Filinvest City.

With distinctive architecture, 1001 Parkway's design lets residents experience an invigorating lifestyle and enables a comfortable life that appreciates nature and overall well-being.

Location
Parkside living is made possible with Filinvest City's human scale & pedestrian-friendly design. The intricate green park system which connects all parts of Filinvest City to one another brings the benefit of green urban living.

 - Spectrum Linear Park

 - Creekside Park

By virtue of being Filinvest City, retail and other conveniences are close by. The location of 1001 Parkway Residences truly gives it the best of both worlds, one of convenience and

Units
1001 Parkway Residences follows the vision for Filinvest City wherein retaining, developing, and nurturing open spaces is a pillar. Every detail, every feature is designed to promote an invigorating lifestyle. Unit offerings are suited for different lifestyles and life stages.

 - 1 Bedroom Classic

All units have balconies, with some being larger than normal for those who put great value on being able to enjoy the outdoors while staying within the confines of their living space.

title: Fully Furnished 1BR Condo for Sale in Parque España, Filinvest, Alabang
description:
JP-CP    - D

Welcome to Parque España !

Located along East Asia Drive at Filinvest City is Parque España, a residence hotel in Muntinlupa City managed by Hospitality Innovators, Inc. Offering top- rate accommodation, Parque España redefines the home-away-from-home concept, allowing business and leisure travelers to relish the utmost in comfort and hospitality.
Parque España offers flexible hotel leasing options - all under negotiable terms. Tenants can choose from a range of fully furnished units with modern amenities: one bedroom deluxe, business executive, two bedroom premiere, and three bedroom suite. Each room features double beds, cable TV, broadband internet, IDD/NDD phone, and hot and cold shower.
Apart from the aforementioned comforts, Parque España provides first class services that include housekeeping, laundry and dry cleaning, airport transfer, car rental, in-room massage, complimentary 24-hour shuttle service to neighboring malls, safety deposit boxes, and a business center. Moreover, for leisure and relaxation, the residence hotel also has an outdoor swimming pool, restaurant, lobby lounge, function room, and a fitness center.

Avida Towers Altura is where everyone can gather around like family and where every day is one great walk in the park. Look forward to spending Saturday nights at home. Only here in the South. Breathe in the fresh air of green outdoors. Bask in the warmth of a close-knit community. Live in a laid-back environment.

title: Brand New 2 Bedroom Corner Unit for Sale in East Bay Residences, Muntinlupa City
For Rent/Sale: 2BR in The Levels Burbank Filinvest Alabang
description:
FOR SALE OR FOR LEASE: THE LEVELS BURBANK 

For Rent: Php75,000/mo (negotiable)

For Sale: Php6,000,000



Located in Filinvest City, Alabang, this lifestlyle-tiered residential enclave is truly an innovation in high rise cosmopolitan living. At street level, a variety of shops and restaurants are interspersed with verdant landscapes and lush gardens. Residential towers of varying heights offer well-appointed units, along with leisure amenities that redefine high-rise living.



FEATURES AND AMENITIES



The Levels takes leisure to new heights with an impressive range of amenities for wellness and leisure activities of all kinds.

Themed gardens • Swimming pool • Children’s playground • Jogging path • Fitness center • Function hall



LOCATION



The Levels is situated within the 244-hectare Filinvest city – a premiere CBD, garden city, mod metropolis, and convergence hub, all in one progressive urban district.

Accessible via the South Luzon Expressway, Alabang-Zapote Road, Commerce and Filinvest Avenues, and other internal roads within Filinvest City
Walking distance from commercial retail establishments such as Westgate Center, Festival Supermall, South Supermarket and Alabang Town Center
Proximity to major business, educational, medical and religious institutions – business districts, premier and exclusive schools, hospitals and churches

Condominium for sale in Alabang near Ayala Alabang
description:
EXQUISITE UPSCALE DEVELOPMENT
Paradise by design
Botanika is an iconic, high-end village set amid a lush vertical setting accentuating nature’s grandeur.
Low Density
Built on 1.55 hectares of prime property, Botanika is an enclave with three residential, mid-rise, low-density condominium buildings. Tower 1 has 13 levels while Tower 2 has 15,  that boasts of generous spaces. With only 12 units or less per floor, residents get to enjoy much sought-after exclusivity that other residential developments could only promise.
Superior World-Class Architecture
Each building is connected to the central gardens by open-air landscaped atriums, emphasizing the sprawling greenery of the property.
Lavish Amenities
Botanika was designed with only the privileged few in mind. Princely Class A amenities and building features are tastefully and seamlessly integrated to enrich the quality of living.
Luxurious Finishes
Exemplary skill, good taste, international experience, and out-of-the-box innovation – all these make up for a design so holistically exquisite down to the last detail.

*available pre selling units 1,2,3 and 4 Bedroom units. 
*Newly launched tower 2 ( pre - selling) 
*low payment scheme available
*for as low as 10% spot downpayment

description:
La Vie Flats Lovely 1 Bedroom Condo for Sale Alabang Muntinlupa
 Ref. No.: ALBC0802
 

 Floor area: 47sqm
 Living area
 Dining area
 1 Bedroom
 1 T&B
 Kitchen
 

 Fully Furnished
 

 Selling Price: ₱9M with 1 parking, inc. of capital gains tax
 

 Inclusive of 1 parking slot and association dues
 

 Live a wonderful lifestyle in La Vie Flats! It's a 1BR unit, very classy unit located in the heart of the south. It is perfect for a guest, couple, family or expats working in Alabang, Parañaque, Laguna, Cavite and Batangas offices. Very accessible to SLEX and Skyway, as well as the airport.
 Near South Station, Asian Hospital, Festival Mall, Alabang Town Center, Commerce Center, Skyway,SLEX, Laguna Technopark, Sta Rosa Industrial Complex, Paseo, Nuvali, Greenfield, Tagaytay, and other places in the South.
 

 La Vie Flats: A Lifestyle That's Worth the Wait
 Barangay Alabang has been known as a thriving investment and residential area that offers a wide array of hangout places, offices, commercial strips, and residential areas for the dynamic individual and family. True to its commitment to building the Filipino dream, Filinvest offers La Vie Flats.
 

 About La Vie Flats
 La Vie Flats is a 22-story condominium that offers an elegant and refreshing lifestyle in the South. It's located within Filinvest City, allowing its residents to live near the best of what the satellite city offers.
 

 Why La Vie Flats is the Ideal Condominium Option in Alabang?
 La Vie offers elegance at an affordable price. Furthermore, it also allows convenient access to Metro Manila and the CALABARZON region. Apart from that, residents will also be close to prime locations within Filinvest City, including Ayala Alabang and Festival Mall. The condominium is great for young professionals and families who want to be close to the booming metro and the southern suburbs.

description:
ND-CP

Corner 2BR Unit for Sale in Bristol at Parkway, Filinvest Alabang, Muntinlupa



*** For BUYERS Only ***


Welcome to Bristol at Parkway !

Standing 40 storeys high, the Bristol Tower illuminates the majestic Filinvest City skyline. The upscale residential condominium in Muntinlupa City is the second of four towers at Parkway Place, a mixed-use development by Filinvest Premier.
Offering a total of 345 masterfully designed luxury residential spaces, Bristol Tower offers one, two and three bedroom units, each boasting of efficient layouts, high-grade finishes, and quality craftsmanship. Apart from these, the Bristol Tower also provides an exhilarating view of Laguna de Bay, affording a privileged few a distinctive living experience.
A notable landmark, the Bristol Tower introduces Zen-inspired amenities such as swimming pools, a landscaped pool deck, courtyard, function room, fitness center, children’s play area, meditation area, study hall, and a media center.
Straddling the Corporate and Parkway Avenues, Bristol Tower is just a block away from the exclusive Palms Country Club, and is just minutes from the PAREF Woodrose School, De La Salle-Zobel School, PAREF Southridge School, and the Asian Hospital.

title: Viento at Cerca 2bedroom Prime Residential Lot in Alabang, Ayala Alabang
description:
Missed investing Serendra?  heres another Serendra type of development in Alabang. Also with 65% open space, low-rise, gated, secured latest project of Ayala Land.

Breathing life into a dynamic new district—Viento, the first phase of Cerca’s masterplan, rises with three residential towers cascading a living experience that is seamlessly integrated. Walkways and paths connect distinct lifestyles to a wide spectrum of choices, facilitating a neighborly atmosphere that’s bright and airy.

Situated within Cerca, a 6.6 hectare integrated mixed-use district located right by Ayala Alabang, Viento is accessible via Investment Drive, Alabang-Zapote Road, and Daang Hari Road. Surrounded by green open spaces, this vibrant district amplifies Southern living with all around walkability. It’s an environment where everything feels safe, natural and easy.

2 Bedroom Condo For Sale, The Levels, Alabang, Muntinlupa City, Filinvest Land Inc.
description:
The Levels is a one-block, four-tower residential condominium development that features laidback suburban living inside a fast-paced business district.
The Levels’ structures of varying heights are clearly reminiscent of the skylines. Its refreshing natural environment captures the ambiance of bountiful parks and outdoor attractions, while its slopping roads dotted with landscaped gardens.
This residential development is set in a tropical landscape, with its four towers uniquely designed with terracing levels, giving it a castle-effect look. High-rise sections will be set in lush greenery, providing residents with views of the gardens.
Advocating nature appreciation and a different kind of suburban living, The Levels marries innovative architectural and landscape concepts to create this exceptional, one-of-a-kind development.
Location:
The Levels is located at Pacific Rim cor. Commerce Ave., Filinvest City, Alabang, Muntinlupa City.

Avida Towers Alabang is located within Madrigal Business Park. It’s nearby major thoroughfares, transport stations, offices, hospitals, malls, schools, churches, and the most exciting developments in the area.
You can shop, see movies, do your weekly groceries, buy home furnishings with Alabang Town Center, Ayala Malls South Park, Festival Mall, Molito Lifestyle Center, Metro Department Store and Supermarket, Makati Supermart Alabang, S&R Membership Shopping, CW Home Depot, Commercenter Alabang and South Park Mall around.
Avida Towers Alabang is also near churches like St. Jerome Emiliani Church, San Roque Catholic Church, New Life, Immaculate Heart of Mary Chapel and Sacred Heart of Jesus Parish. With all these churches nearby, there's no excuse for you to miss the Sunday mass. 
Send your kids to most exclusive private schools in the metro: De La Salle Santiago Zobel School, San Beda College Alabang, PAREF Southridge School, PAREF Woodrose School and Manresa School.
For your health concerns, Asian Hospital and Medical Center, Alabang Medical Clinic, Hillside General Hospital and Muntinlupa Doctors Hospital are all just a drive away from Avida Towers Alabang. 
Practice active lifestyle by hitting the gym at the nearest Gold's Gym and Fitness First branch, jog around The Park in Madrigal, practice your bike skills and tricks at Filinvest MTB Trail, play soccer at Team Socceroo Soccer Field or even learn driving at Southpoint Driving Range. 

For Direct Buyers Call/Txt 
Riyah Castro

title: 2br unit with 2 parking slots at Botanika Nature Residences
description:
One thing that sets Botanika apart and ahead of the rest is masterfully integrating mansion living with the convenience of condominium living.

Designed to invigorate, this high-end village is set amid a lush vertical setting. The residential development boasts of themed garden settings.

Its iconic leaf-shape structure and the impressive feat of respecting the land contours and rolling terrain espouse a more natural way of life, with the revitalizing greens within breathing distance from you.

The unique atrium design camouflages the condominium feel to create a homier yet more open, sweeping and unrestricted living experience for its residents.

title: 3-Bedroom Unit for Sale at Aspen Tower
description: The Aspen Tower is a luxury residential condominium offering in Alabang City. This 23-story resort-inspired high-rise development is located along Filinvest Avenue and is a walking distance to Festival Mall, Asian Hospital, Palms Country Club. Nearby locators also include Alabang Town Center, SM South Mall, De La Salle Zobel and San Beda and is a few minutes drive to Makati CBD and further south via SLEX. The community is low-density with only 122 units in the entire building.

title: ANUVA RESIDENCE resort landscape garden near SLEX NAIA Sm Sucat
description:
Welcome to ANUVA Residence, I have 7 various units, 5 bedroom and 2 bedrooms respectively,  fully furnished,  pool access(Brokers/ Agents  are welcome).

Can be rented daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly.

Top 10 Advantages of Staying in Anuva Residences, Sucat (For Rentpad Ad)
1. Prime Location Along SLEX
Strategically located along the East Service Road, just minutes from SLEX Sucat Exit—easy access to Makati, BGC, Alabang, and NAIA.
2. Affordable Urban Living
Competitive rental rates with resort-style features—ideal for young professionals, small families, and students.
3. Resort-Inspired Amenities
Enjoy swimming pools, clubhouse, jogging paths, basketball court, landscaped gardens, and kids' play area.
4. Ready for Move-In Units
Fully furnished and semi-furnished options available—just bring your suitcase and settle in.
5. Near Malls, Groceries & Schools
Close to SM City Sucat, Santana Grove, Alabang Town Center, and schools like PAREF Southridge and San Beda Alabang.
6. Flood-Free & Gated Community
Secure, elevated location with 24/7 security and perimeter fencing—peace of mind for all residents.
7. Efficient Transport Access
Near bus stops, jeepney routes, and future Skyway expansions—ideal for commuters.
8. Family-Friendly Environment
Quiet neighborhood with child-safe amenities and community spaces—perfect for starting families.
9. Green Open Spaces
Over 80% open space in the development—rare in Metro Manila condos, offering fresh air and less congestion.
10. Flexible Lease Terms
Short-term and long-term rentals available; flexible deals to suit different tenant needs.

 Live, Work, and Invest in the Heart of Metro South
 Studio N offers a prime investment opportunity in the heart of Filinvest City's Northgate Cyberzone, Alabang, Muntinlupa. This strategically located development places you at the center of a future-ready, master-planned community experiencing rapid growth and offering unparalleled convenience.

 Filinvest City has witnessed a remarkable 6x growth in land value over the past decade, solidifying its position as an ideal location for both investors and home-seekers. title: ANUVA RESIDENCE resort landscape garden near SLEX NAIA Sm Sucat
description:
Welcome to ANUVA Residence, I have 7 various units, 5 bedroom and 2 bedrooms respectively,  fully furnished,  pool access(Brokers/ Agents  are welcome).

Can be rented daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly.

Top 10 Advantages of Staying in Anuva Residences, Sucat (For Rentpad Ad)
1. Prime Location Along SLEX
Strategically located along the East Service Road, just minutes from SLEX Sucat Exit—easy access to Makati, BGC, Alabang, and NAIA.
2. Affordable Urban Living
Competitive rental rates with resort-style features—ideal for young professionals, small families, and students.
3. Resort-Inspired Amenities
Enjoy swimming pools, clubhouse, jogging paths, basketball court, landscaped gardens, and kids' play area.
4. Ready for Move-In Units
Fully furnished and semi-furnished options available—just bring your suitcase and settle in.
5. Near Malls, Groceries & Schools
Close to SM City Sucat, Santana Grove, Alabang Town Center, and schools like PAREF Southridge and San Beda Alabang.
6. Flood-Free & Gated Community
Secure, elevated location with 24/7 security and perimeter fencing—peace of mind for all residents.
7. Efficient Transport Access
Near bus stops, jeepney routes, and future Skyway expansions—ideal for commuters.
8. Family-Friendly Environment
Quiet neighborhood with child-safe amenities and community spaces—perfect for starting families.
9. Green Open Spaces
Over 80% open space in the development—rare in Metro Manila condos, offering fresh air and less congestion.
10. Flexible Lease Terms
Short-term and long-term rentals available; flexible deals to suit different tenant needs.

title: ANUVA RESIDENCE resort landscape garden near SLEX NAIA Sm Sucat
description:
Welcome to ANUVA Residence, I have 7 various units, 5 bedroom and 2 bedrooms respectively,  fully furnished,  pool access(Brokers/ Agents  are welcome).

Can be rented daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly.

Top 10 Advantages of Staying in Anuva Residences, Sucat (For Rentpad Ad)
1. Prime Location Along SLEX
Strategically located along the East Service Road, just minutes from SLEX Sucat Exit—easy access to Makati, BGC, Alabang, and NAIA.
2. Affordable Urban Living
Competitive rental rates with resort-style features—ideal for young professionals, small families, and students.
3. Resort-Inspired Amenities
Enjoy swimming pools, clubhouse, jogging paths, basketball court, landscaped gardens, and kids' play area.
4. Ready for Move-In Units
Fully furnished and semi-furnished options available—just bring your suitcase and settle in.
5. Near Malls, Groceries & Schools
Close to SM City Sucat, Santana Grove, Alabang Town Center, and schools like PAREF Southridge and San Beda Alabang.
6. Flood-Free & Gated Community
Secure, elevated location with 24/7 security and perimeter fencing—peace of mind for all residents.
7. Efficient Transport Access
Near bus stops, jeepney routes, and future Skyway expansions—ideal for commuters.
8. Family-Friendly Environment
Quiet neighborhood with child-safe amenities and community spaces—perfect for starting families.
9. Green Open Spaces
Over 80% open space in the development—rare in Metro Manila condos, offering fresh air and less congestion.
10. Flexible Lease Terms
Short-term and long-term rentals available; flexible deals to suit different tenant needs.

Studio N: Your Prime Investment in Filinvest City's Thriving Hub
 Live, Work, and Invest in the Heart of Metro South
 Studio N offers a prime investment opportunity in the heart of Filinvest City's Northgate Cyberzone, Alabang, Muntinlupa. This strategically located development places you at the center of a future-ready, master-planned community experiencing rapid growth and offering unparalleled convenience.
 

 A Booming Location:
 Filinvest City has witnessed a remarkable 6x growth in land value over the past decade, solidifying its position as an ideal location for both investors and home-seekers. Studio N capitalizes on this growth, offering a smart investment in a flourishing environment. Northgate Cyberzone itself is the preferred address for premier and multinational IT BPOs and Regional Operating Headquarters, including industry giants like Accenture, Genpact, Optum, and many more, ensuring a vibrant and dynamic community.

 This excellent accessibility puts you within easy reach of business districts, commercial centers, and leisure destinations throughout Metro Manila.
 

 Live a Life of Ease:
 Enjoy the convenience of having various hubs and sites within proximity, catering to all your daily needs. Filinvest City's pedestrian- and biker-friendly environment promotes a healthy and sustainable lifestyle, allowing you to easily access modernized business hubs, lifestyle centers, medical and wellness centers.

 - Magnetic Keycard Access: Enhanced security for peace of mind.

 - 100% Back-up Power in Common Areas: Uninterrupted power supply for essential amenities.
 

 Choose Your Ideal Unit:

Top 10 Advantages of Staying in Anuva Residences, Sucat (For Rentpad Ad)

Strategically located along the East Service Road, just minutes from SLEX Sucat Exit—easy access to Makati, BGC, Alabang, and NAIA.

Competitive rental rates with resort-style features—ideal for young professionals, small families, and students.

Close to SM City Sucat, Santana Grove, Alabang Town Center, and schools like PAREF Southridge and San Beda Alabang.
6. Flood-Free & Gated Community
Secure, elevated location with 24/7 security and perimeter fencing—peace of mind for all residents.
7. Efficient Transport Access
Near bus stops, jeepney routes, and future Skyway expansions—ideal for commuters.
8. Family-Friendly Environment
Quiet neighborhood with child-safe amenities and community spaces—perfect for starting families.
9. Green Open Spaces
Over 80% open space in the development—rare in Metro Manila condos, offering fresh air and less congestion.
10. Flexible Lease Terms
Short-term and long-term rentals available; flexible deals to suit different tenant needs.

Close to SM City Sucat, Santana Grove, Alabang Town Center, and schools like PAREF Southridge and San Beda Alabang.
6. Flood-Free & Gated Community
Secure, elevated location with 24/7 security and perimeter fencing—peace of mind for all residents.
7. Efficient Transport Access
Near bus stops, jeepney routes, and future Skyway expansions—ideal for commuters.
8. Family-Friendly Environment
Quiet neighborhood with child-safe amenities and community spaces—perfect for starting families.
9. Green Open Spaces
Over 80% open space in the development—rare in Metro Manila condos, offering fresh air and less congestion.
10. Flexible Lease Terms
Short-term and long-term rentals available; flexible deals to suit different tenant needs.

title: For Sale Studio Unit at Studio N Work & Live in Alabang Muntinlupa, Northgate, Filinvest | U1712
description:
Studio N: Your Prime Investment in Filinvest City's Thriving Hub
 Live, Work, and Invest in the Heart of Metro South
 Studio N offers a prime investment opportunity in the heart of Filinvest City's Northgate Cyberzone, Alabang, Muntinlupa. This strategically located development places you at the center of a future-ready, master-planned community experiencing rapid growth and offering unparalleled convenience.
 

 A Booming Location:
 Filinvest City has witnessed a remarkable 6x growth in land value over the past decade, solidifying its position as an ideal location for both investors and home-seekers. Studio N capitalizes on this growth, offering a smart investment in a flourishing environment. Northgate Cyberzone itself is the preferred address for premier and multinational IT BPOs and Regional Operating Headquarters, including industry giants like Accenture, Genpact, Optum, and many more, ensuring a vibrant and dynamic community.
 

 Unparalleled Accessibility:
 Studio N's prime location within Filinvest City provides seamless connectivity to major thoroughfares:
 -SLEX
 -Skyway
 -Alabang-Zapote Road
 -Daang Hari Road
 This excellent accessibility puts you within easy reach of business districts, commercial centers, and leisure destinations throughout Metro Manila.
 

 Live a Life of Ease:
 Enjoy the convenience of having various hubs and sites within proximity, catering to all your daily needs. Filinvest City's pedestrian- and biker-friendly environment promotes a healthy and sustainable lifestyle, allowing you to easily access modernized business hubs, lifestyle centers, medical and wellness centers.
 

 Building Features for Modern Living:
 Studio N prioritizes your security and comfort with these key building features:
 - Magnetic Keycard Access: Enhanced security for peace of mind.
 - 24/7 Security: Round-the-clock protection for residents.
 - 2 Passenger and 1 Service/Passenger Elevator: Efficient vertical transportation.
 - 100% Back-up Power in Common Areas: Uninterrupted power supply for essential amenities.
 

 Choose Your Ideal Unit:
 Studio N offers thoughtfully designed units to suit your needs:
 -Kitchen base and overhead cabinets with stone surface
 -Stainless steel sink with grease trap
 -Bunk bed with mattress
 -Study table
 -Closet
 

 Invest in Your Future Today:
 Studio N presents a unique opportunity to invest in a prime location within one of Metro Manila's fastest-growing business districts. Contact us today to learn more about available units, pricing, and investment options. Don't miss out on this chance to be a part of the thriving Filinvest City community!
